description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the setting in which a care event occurs, such as home, GMP surgery, outpatient, etc. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'CDA Care Setting Type' subset with subset original id 1271000000134; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Clinical document architecture care setting type simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000331000000108.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.
